string-array.item: Apple is an awesome company. It was founded by Steve Jobs, and his friend Steve Wozniak. Steve Jobs, one of the great visionaries. But I don\'t like Apple Products. :P
Google is awesome too. The best thing I love about Google is Android. Android is damn sexy!
An unfinished project started by Hrishikesh, turns into a blog which covers Android tutorials. And now it builds Android apps now. The latest app is Sleep Optimal.
